question: Test cross in Pea plant is
choices: A cross between <katex>$F_{2}$</katex> tall plant and recessive parent
A cross between <katex>$F_{2}$</katex> dwarf plant and recessive parent
A cross between <katex>$F_{2}$</katex> tall plant with dominant parent
explanation: A test cross involves crossing an individual with a dominant phenotype (whose genotype is unknown, e.g., from <katex>$F_2$</katex>) with a homozygous recessive parent to determine the unknown genotype.
